long_description:
# Falling Stairs and Slabs

## Dependancies

Uses one of (in this preference order)

- `moreblocks`
- `mcl_stairs`
- `stairs`

To create slabs and stairs for each falling block.

- `default` for
		 - `default:gravel`
		 - `default:sand`
		 - `default:desert_sand`
		 - `default:silver_sand`
- `mcl_core` for
			- `mcl_core:gravel`
			- `mcl_core:sand`
		 - `mcl_core:redsand`
name: falling_stairs
short_description: Adds falling stairs and slabs for gravel, sand and others.
title: Falling Stairs
